thread.title: State Department Press Room Goes Dark — At Least for Now
thread.title_full: State Department Press Room Goes Dark — At Least for Now - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: State Department Press Room Goes Dark — At Least for Now
text: For the first six weeks of the Trump administration, the State Department didn’t hold a single on-camera press briefing — long a fixture of U.S. diplomatic communications — finally beginning them on March 7. Less than three weeks later, they’ve stopped again. Officials said the on-camera briefings won’t resume for at least two weeks as   Trump Team's Ties to Russia: A List of Who's Who
